channel.title: Latest News on LIEF
channel.description: Recent content in Latest News on LIEF

item.title: LIEF v0.13.0
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post highlights the main changes in LIEF v0.13.0

item.title: Mach-O Support Enhancements
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post describes the enhancements made in LIEF for modifying Mach-O files

item.title: LIEF v0.12.0
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: LIEF v0.12.0 is out. This blog post highlights the main changes and the upcomming features

item.title: LIEF RTTI & Exceptions
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post explains how and why we started to remove the exceptions and the RTTI in LIEF.

item.title: New ELF Builder
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: After spending months on refactoring the ELF builder, here are the improvements.

item.title: Profiling C++ code with Frida (2nd part)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post brings additional information about using Frida to hook function in a static library. It exposes the limits of the approach regarding the different C++ ABI

item.title: Profiling C++ code with Frida
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post introduces a new technique to profile C/C++ code with Frida

item.title: LIEF - Release 0.11.1
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post outlines the fixes made in LIEF 0.11.1

item.title: LIEF - Release 0.11.0
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post summarizes the changes in LIEF 0.11.0

item.title: LIEF - Release 0.9.0
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post introduces major changes in LIEF 0.9 as well as work in progress features that will be integrated in further releases

item.title: Have fun with LIEF and Executable Formats!
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post introduces new features in LIEF 0.8.3 as well as some uses cases.

item.title: LIEF - Library to Instrument Executable Formats
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Blog post about the open-sourcing of LIEF
